feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Use Watchlist on sending email verifications by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20114
  • perf: Slim down loggedInViewer tRPC router by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20111
  • fix: atoms making requests to customers' domains by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20084
  • perf: Remove slots router from publicViewer by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20128
  • perf: Move apps procedures off of loggedInViewer by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20112
  • refactor: Delete dead code that is not safe to use by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20141
  • chore: stringify body for request interceptor/middleware by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20131
  • fix: Salesforce Stricter Website querying to prevent wrong account match during contact owner check by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20133
  • fix: don't remind platform users in reminder cron by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20056
  • chore: create org membership should be an upsert apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20129
  • fix: Salesforce - fallback to creating lead by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20137
  • feat: v2 api phone based organization team event types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20134
  • fix: UID cookie isn't accessible/created when in embed as it is third party context. by @gopoto in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19859
  • test: Add tests for Booker component by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19051
  • fix: prevent auto accepting emails for platform orgs by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20125
  • fix: flaky e2e tests by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20168
  • fix: spacing by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20172
  • chore: Add logging to Salesforce by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20167
  • fix: sms formatting by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18647
  • perf: Remove QueryCell usage in availability view by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20176
  • fix: eslint error by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20127
  • fix: add documentation to the possible values of :app in conferencing controller by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20164

New Contributors

  • @gopoto made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19859

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.0...v5.1.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: add scrolling to empty webhook dropdown by @aabdullaharif in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20191
  • fix: logo-sync-issue by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20190
  • fix: use correct logo by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20194
  • fix: hotfix - salesforce query by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20196
  • fix: missing booking reminder reference in cron by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20200
  • fix: team-update-on-eventTypes-page by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20152
  • perf: Remove app-store reference from @calcom/ui by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20188
  • fix: use correct skeleton loader by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20197
  • fix: few flaky tests in ooo and bookings-list by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20170
  • fix: calcom trpc sessio circle dep by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19893
  • fix: set default managed users calendars by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20208
  • feat: booker atom confirm and back button styling by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20162
  • fix: Unskip the confirm step if there are multiple locations by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20051
  • fix: Loading indicator alignment in settings page by @21prnv in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20219
  • refactor: v2 booking responses schema by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20030
  • fix: A user exists with that username by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20217
  • fix: updating the user does not invalidate/refresh the table by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20228

New Contributors

  • @aabdullaharif made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20191
  • @21prnv made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20219

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.1...v5.1.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • perf: do not import from @calcom/ui barrel file by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20184
  • chore: added padding bottom to main by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20224
  • chore: get oauth client params from event-type hosts by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20236
  • perf: Remove packages/ui/index.ts barrel file by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20243
  • fix: case insensitive search on organization member list by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20240
  • fix: add response id to webhook payload by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20247
  • fix: Slugify the team slug - as uppercase teams could be 404 pages by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20242
  • fix: e2e flake by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20252
  • fix: Errors seen in some cases when organization is created through w… by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20249
  • fix: repeatedly occurring flaky tests by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20238
  • feat: allow timezones selection in Booker atom via prop by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20044
  • refactor: event type builder by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19459
  • perf: fix circular dependencies by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20121
  • fix: add aria-labels for accessibility in AddVariablesDropdown and T… by @krakenftw in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20260
  • feat: improve trpc exception handling for api v2 by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20158
  • fix: replyTo includes the correct email by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20235

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.2...v5.1.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Upgrade to Next 15 by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18834
  • chore: missing awaits for params/search params in two pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20276
  • fix: match SkeletonLoaderTeamList component layout by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20263
  • fix: /availability - show skeleton only if cached data do not exist by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20275
  • fix: Flaky 'OOO records are fetched correctly....' e2e (Final) by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20266
  • fix: missing Prisma type in libraries by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20285
  • fix: Padding issue in text fields and dropdown by @21prnv in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20287
  • fix: removing unnecessary styles by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20284
  • fix: i18n failed to fetch translations results in api v2 crash by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20294
  • fix: booker atom booking with split name by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20298
  • docs: v2 team event schedulingType by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20289
  • chore: ensure default calendars for delegated users by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20300
  • perf: Move OOO-related tRPC procedures to new routers by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20136
  • chore: clean up HeadSeo by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20272

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.3...v5.1.4

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Auto builds icons before dev and build scripts by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20304
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20307
  • fix: Add salesforce query validation in integration tests by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20209
  • fix: flaky 'People filter includes bookings where filtered person is attendee' e2e test by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20311
  • chore: Upgrade Next to 15.2.3 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20315
  • docs: use correct variables in reschedule <Booker /> code snippet by @AyanavaKarmakar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20316
  • fix: calendar setting skeleton by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20317
  • fix: lint errors by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20323
  • chore: Upgrade @sentry/nextjs to 9.8.0 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20324
  • fix: continue-on-error to false for the lint test. by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20325
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20320

New Contributors

  • @AyanavaKarmakar made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20316

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.4...v5.1.5
